thread.section_title: Palm Beach County High School Sports - Sun Sentinel
thread.title: Aquinas WR Bruce to visit Ohio State
thread.title_full: Aquinas WR Bruce to visit Ohio State - Sun Sentinel

author: Patrick Maks
title: Aquinas WR Bruce to visit Ohio State
text:
St. Thomas Aquinas senior receiver Sam Bruce announced on Tuesday he will visit Ohio State on Oct. 17 when the top-ranked Buckeyes play Penn State.
Bruce, a four-star recruit, committed to Miami in July 2014. He holds offers from almost 20 schools, including Alabama, Florida, FSU, Michigan, Notre Dame and Oregon.
Bruce's teammate, senior defensive lineman Nick Bosa, committed to OSU this summer.
Bruce is the nephew of former NFL receiver Isaac Bruce.
In five games this season, Bruce has caught 19 passes for 216 yards and three touchdowns.
